title: Help GD I think I really like this girl
body: Whenever she's in my line of sight my heart beat rapidly increases, I have to look away from her so she won't see me blush. She is literally an angel from the heavens above. I just want to take her hand and make her mine. Her lips are as red as cherries, and I wonder if they taste like them too ^_~. What should I do to get her, I sit next to her in English.
